question: What does time complexity of an algorithm measure?
options: The total time taken to execute the code
The amount of memory used by the algorithm
The number of basic operations performed by the algorithm as a function of input size
The number of lines of code
correctAnswer: The number of basic operations performed by the algorithm as a function of input size
